metadata.title: CVE-2022-1056 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Out-of-bounds Read error in tiffcrop in libtiff 4.3.0 allows attackers tocause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compilelibtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 46dc8fcd.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1056` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm1').
